name: EN-RU Сага о мирах
description:
Hello to you all from one of the first EN-RU entries!
We have battled intense heat to bring you this masterpiece 
We would love to present you our Сага о мирах, a gorgeous role playing game that we poured our souls and hearts (along with blood and sweat) into! We hope you enjoy it, please feel free to vote for us and post your comments (positive, of course).

Localization: Alevtina Balina & Diana Ya
Editing: Alevtina Balina & Diana Ya
Proofreading: Alevtina Balina & Diana Ya
Project management: Alevtina Balina & Diana Ya
Creative direction: Alevtina Balina & Diana Ya
Execution: Alevtina Balina & Diana Ya

and just your friendly neighbourhood translators: Alevtina Balina & Diana Ya

Find us here:
